postbag.translation[0].definitions[0].de: all the letters received by an important person, television programme etc on a particular occasion
postbag.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: We’ve had an enormous postbag on the recent programme changes.
postbag.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a bag for carrying letters, used by the person who delivers them
postbag.translation[1].definitions[0].de: all the letters received by a public person, television programme etc
postbag.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The series did not please everyone, and the TV network’s postbag was full of complaints.
